text: thæcring brrda phu thi ptiseth sraththa læa phwk khea di tay pi nı khna thi phwk khea pen phu ptiseth sraththa nan thxng tem phændin k ca mi thuk rab cak khn dı nı phwk khea penxankhad læa mæwa khea ca chı thxng nan thi taw khea ktam chn hela ni hæla sahrab phwk khea nan khux kar lngthosʹ xan cebsæb læa thang mimi brrda phu chwyhelux dı «sahrab phwk khea dwy
